snippet: When a more sophisticated helmet ran into problems, a backup was ordered. But the higher-tech model is improving.
abstract: Pentagon announces decision to stop working on a conventional backup helmet for pilots of the new F-35 fighter jet and stick with a troubled, but improving, higher-tech model.
lead_paragraph: When a more sophisticated helmet ran into problems, a backup was ordered. But the higher-tech model is improving.

headline.main: Pentagon Drops Backup Helmet for F-35 Pilots
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Drops Backup Helmet for F-35 Pilots
